original_text: Moses and Eleazar took the gold gifts from the soldiers' officers and leaders into the Tent of Meeting. It would help the Israelites to remember how the Lord had helped them.
korean_text: 모세와 제사장 엘르아살이 천부장과 백부장들에게서 금을 취하여 회막에 드려 여호와 앞에서 이스라엘 자손의 기념을 삼았더라

sentences.original_text: Moses and Eleazar took the gold gifts
from the soldiers' officers and leaders
It would help the Israelites to remember
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 이스라엘 백성들이 기억하는 데 도움이 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: how the Lord had helped them
